ceo.label: CEO Message
ceo.title: CEO Message
ceo.intro: Raon Total Solution aims to be your premier partner, maximizing customer value through 30 years of accumulated experience and technical expertise in the oil refinery, petrochemical, and shipbuilding industries.
ceo.quote:
All employees of Raon Total Solution
will continue to strive
to provide the highest quality and service
under the belief of 'customer first'.
ceo.partnership: Through close cooperation with global partners, we supply the latest technology and products domestically, and together we create your success through rapid delivery and professional technical support.
ceo.commitment: We will continue to grow as a trusted business partner that provides the highest value to our customers through unwavering trust and innovation.

shipbuilding.intro1: We are the Korean agent for WTQ, a cylinder liner manufacturer located in Yangzhou, China, supplying cylinder liners with diameters ranging from 480 to 1500mm.
shipbuilding.intro2: WTQ is one of the major manufacturers in China producing ship main engine cylinder liners, and opened a Korean agency in 2025.
shipbuilding.intro3: We guarantee stable quality and rapid delivery with globally certified products.
services: Cylinder liners for commercial vehicles, construction machinery, and locomotives

Liners for sludge pumps and hydraulic cylinders
Cylinder liners for compressors and generator units

hero.title: Motor Solution
hero.description: 30 years of compressor supply experience, foreign motor parts supply and explosion-proof certification solutions

spareParts.title: Foreign Motor Spare Parts Solution
spareParts.description: As the official domestic distributor for LDW (Germany) and NIDEC (Italy), we provide high-quality motor parts and technical services

ldw.description: We supply high-performance motor parts and replacement parts from LDW Germany. Known for precision quality and excellent durability, trusted by industrial sites.

nidec.description: We supply NIDEC Italy's industrial motors and parts. With high-efficiency design and global quality certification, applicable to various industrial sectors.

technical.title: Technical Support
technical.description: Technical consulting from motor selection to installation and operation by professional engineers

supervisor.title: Supervisor Dispatch
supervisor.description: Manufacturer expert dispatch service during installation and commissioning

parts.title: Parts Supply
parts.description: Rapid supply of genuine spare parts and consumables

certification.title: Domestic Explosion-Proof Certification Solution
certification.description: One-stop consulting service for obtaining domestic explosion-proof certification for foreign motors

kosha.description: Korea Occupational Safety and Health Agency explosion-proof certification support

ktl.description: Korea Testing Laboratory explosion-proof testing and certification support

kgs.description: Korea Gas Safety Corporation gas equipment explosion-proof certification support

consulting.title: Explosion-Proof Certification Consulting
consulting.description: We support the entire process of obtaining explosion-proof certification for domestic installation of foreign motors. From document preparation to testing and certification acquisition, we handle it one-stop.

items.review: Product specification review and certification feasibility analysis
items.documentation: Certification application document preparation and translation support
items.testing: Testing agency coordination and schedule arrangement

cta.title: Need motor parts or explosion-proof certification?
cta.description: Our experts with 30 years of experience will propose the optimal solution

hero.title: Compressor
hero.description: NEUMAN & ESSER reciprocating compressors and consumables

overview.title: Product Overview
overview.description: NEA Group's NEUMAN & ESSER has been a specialist in reciprocating compressors since 1830 with over 190 years of history. As a global leader in process gas compression, they provide optimized solutions for oil refinery, petrochemical, and gas industries.

cta.title: Need a Compressor Solution?
cta.description: From new compressor installation to parts supply, troubleshooting, and maintenance - we provide one-stop solutions.

hero.description: From FIMA turbo compressor solutions and reciprocating compressor parts to troubleshooting and maintenance services - we provide comprehensive compressor solutions.

newCompressor.title: NEW COMPRESSOR SOLUTION
newCompressor.description: FIMA, established in 1946, is a global leader in manufacturing high-efficiency turbo compressors and industrial blowers based on German engineering. We provide optimized solutions for oil refinery, petrochemical, power generation, and environmental industries.

spareParts.title: SPARE PARTS SOLUTION
spareParts.description: We supply complete core components for reciprocating compressors through our global partners. High-quality parts from verified manufacturers like WTQ, Castanet SA, and KB Delta extend equipment life and maximize operational efficiency.

troubleshooting.title: TROUBLE SHOOTING
troubleshooting.description: Through our global OEM network, we provide professional diagnostics and solutions for various compressor operating issues. Experts with 30 years of experience recommend optimal solutions.

step1.title: Problem Diagnosis
step1.desc: Accurate root cause identification through operational data analysis and on-site inspection

step2.title: Solution Proposal
step2.desc: Optimal solution derivation through OEM technical cooperation

step3.title: Rapid Response
step3.desc: One-stop service from parts procurement to on-site support

maintenance.title: MAINTENANCE & REPAIR
maintenance.description: Through partnerships with local maintenance contractors, we provide fast and professional services from routine inspections to emergency repairs. Minimize unexpected downtime with preventive maintenance.

preventive.title: Preventive Maintenance
preventive.desc: Regular inspection and parts replacement planning

pumpSolution.title: PUMP SOLUTION
pumpSolution.subtitle: CP Pump Magnetic Drive Pump
pumpSolution.description: CP Pumpen's magnetic drive pumps are the optimal solution for safe, leak-free chemical transfer. With 100% seal-less design, they prevent environmental contamination and safety accidents while dramatically reducing maintenance costs.

troubleShooting.title: TROUBLE SHOOTING
troubleShooting.subtitle: Corrosive Fluids & Slurry Problem Solving
troubleShooting.description: CP Pump solves corrosive fluid and slurry transfer problems that are difficult to handle with conventional pumps. Special materials and designs enable stable operation even under demanding process conditions.
troubleShooting.highlight: Magnetic Pump Compatible with Foreign Materials!
troubleShooting.highlightDescription: With CP Pump's proprietary technology, fluids containing foreign materials can be safely transferred using magnetic pumps.

solutions.title: CP Pump Solutions
items: Seal-less design eliminates leakage at source
Special impeller for foreign material handling

cta.title: Need the Optimal Pump Solution?
cta.description: Experts with 30 years of experience will recommend the best pump for your process.

hero.title: Mixer & Agitator
hero.description: SPX FLOW Industrial Mixers and Agitators
hero.intro: As the domestic Master Agency for SPXFLOW, we support the design and manufacture of various mixing process MIXERs. We provide industrial mixer solutions from world-class brands including Lightnin, Plenty, Philadelphia, Stelzer, and Uutechnic.
hero.contractInfo: Signed SPX Flow Technology Korea Master Agency contract in 2022

mixingSolution.title: Mixing Solution
mixingSolution.description: We provide solutions optimized for mixing processes in various industrial fields. Through SPX FLOW's global brand portfolio, we design customized mixers that meet customer requirements.

efficiency.title: Energy Efficiency Optimization
efficiency.description: Advanced CFD analysis and impeller design minimize energy consumption while delivering optimal mixing performance.

customization.title: Custom Design
customization.description: Custom designs tailored to customer process requirements handle various viscosity and mixing conditions.

expertise.title: 30 Years of Expertise
expertise.description: We propose optimal mixer solutions based on accumulated experience in oil refinery and petrochemical fields.

brands.title: SPXFlow Mixer Brands
brands.description: SPX FLOW has various mixer brands specialized for each industry sector. We provide optimal solutions by utilizing the expertise of each brand.

overview.title: Product Overview
overview.description: SPX FLOW is a global leader in highly engineered solutions. Lightnin brand industrial mixers provide optimal mixing performance in various fields including oil refinery, petrochemical, chemical, and food industries.

cta.title: Need the Optimal Mixer Solution?
cta.description: Experts with 30 years of experience will propose the optimal mixer for your process.

globalNetwork.title: Global Network
globalNetwork.description: We have partnerships with world-class manufacturers from Europe, America, and Asia.

techSupport.title: Technical Support
techSupport.description: We provide rapid technical support and after-sales service through close cooperation with manufacturers.

stableSupply.title: Stable Supply
stableSupply.description: Stable inventory and fast delivery are possible through cooperation with partners.

competitivePrice.title: Competitive Pricing
competitivePrice.description: We offer reasonable prices through direct supply via agency contracts.

qualityAssurance.title: Quality Guarantee
qualityAssurance.description: Quality is guaranteed through direct supply from manufacturers, with no risk of counterfeits.

majorClients.title: Major Clients
majorClients.description: Leading energy, chemical, and heavy industry companies in Korea trust Raon Total Solution's technology and service.

trustSection.title: Trusted Partner
trustSection.description: Major domestic refineries including SK Energy, S-OIL, GS Caltex, HD Hyundai Oilbank, as well as petrochemical and general industry companies, trust Raon Total Solution's expertise.
trustSection.experience: With 30 years of experience, we are a trusted partner providing the highest quality parts and technical services to major energy, chemical, and heavy industry companies in Korea.

stats.experienceDesc: Inheriting 30 years of expertise in rotating machinery

businessInfo.label: Business Information
businessInfo.companyName: Company: Raon Total Solution Co., Ltd.

footer.copyright: Â© {year} Raon Total Solution. All rights reserved.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: Privacy Policy of Raon Total Solution

collection.title: 1. Information We Collect
collection.content: We collect the following personal information for inquiry handling and customer support: name, company name, email address, phone number, and inquiry details. The collected information is used solely for customer inquiry response and service provision.

usage.title: 2. Use of Information
usage.content: The collected personal information is used for responding to customer inquiries, providing product and service information, and delivering quotations. We do not use personal information for purposes other than those collected without consent.

protection.title: 3. Information Protection
protection.content: We implement technical and administrative security measures to protect personal information. Personal information is encrypted and stored, and only authorized personnel can access it.

contact.title: 4. Contact Information
contact.content: For inquiries regarding personal information processing, please contact us at: Email: rts@raontotalsolution.co.kr / Phone: +82-2-575-3051

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.description: Terms of Service for Raon Total Solution website

general.title: 1. General Provisions
general.content: These Terms of Service aim to establish the basic terms and conditions for the use of website services provided by Raon Total Solution (hereinafter referred to as 'Company').

service.title: 2. Service Usage
service.content: The Company provides services including product information, technical consultation, and quotation inquiries. Services are available 24 hours a day, 365 days a year, unless there are special business or technical circumstances.

liability.title: 3. Limitation of Liability
liability.content: The Company is exempt from liability for service provision when services cannot be provided due to force majeure such as natural disasters. The Company is not responsible for service disruptions caused by user negligence.

copyright.title: 4. Copyright
copyright.content: All content on the website (text, images, logos, etc.) is owned by the Company. Unauthorized reproduction, distribution, or transmission is prohibited under copyright law.
